General.Name: Pekat Group Bhd
General.Description: Pekat Group Berhad, through its subsidiaries, designs, supplies, and installs solar photovoltaic systems and power plants, and related services. It operates in three divisions: Solar Photovoltaics, Earthing and Lightning Protection, and Trading. The company supplies and installs earthing and lighting protection systems for buildings, facilities, and structures, as well as distributes electrical products and accessories. It also trades in electrical engineering products; operates as a general contractor; and develops and distributes software applications. Pekat Group Berhad was founded in 1999 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
